item.description:
Please note: This month we will be meeting on the first Sunday in May (May 1st) since the last Sunday in April is Easter.

 

For April we will be reading Still Alice by Lisa Genova.  "Alice Howland is proud of the life she worked so hard to build.  At fifty years old, she's a cognitive psychology professor at Harvard and a world-renowned expert in linguistics with a successful husband and three grown children.  When she becomes increasingly disoriented and forgetful, a tragic diagnosis changes her life - and her relationship with her family and the world - forever."

 

Hope you all enjoy the book and I look forward to seeing you May 1st.

group.name: The Brookline Book Club Meetup Group

item.name: April (May) Book Club
